XAxisResolution: Number of lattice vertices along the X axis
YAxisResolution: Number of lattice vertices along the Y axis
ZAxisResolution: Number of lattice vertices along the Z axis
Padding: Relative distance the lattice extends from the mesh
InterpolationType: Whether to use linear or cubic interpolation to get new mesh vertex positions from the lattice
bDeformNormals: Whether to use approximate new vertex normals using the deformer
GizmoCoordinateSystem: Whether the gizmo's axes remain aligned with world axes or rotate as the gizmo is transformed
bSetPivotMode: If Set Pivot Mode is active, the gizmo can be repositioned without moving the selected lattice points
bSoftDeformation: Whether to use soft deformation of the lattice
